00004 // If we did our jobs right this section should be the only place that you
00005 //need to change to compile this on a supported platform. Just remark all the
00006 //lines that are not your platform using "//" and unremark your platform.
00007 //
00008 // Should you choose to port this to your platform, make sure that all the
00009 //required libraries are installed, then make sure to write an implementation
00010 //for each of the functions in crossplatform.cpp
